topics.body:
I was playing Skyrim and I found this guy's hut in the middle of nowhere.
The guy was named Drelas and I didn't know whether he was hostile or not.

First test, walked up to him and got Blizzard. Died at the spot.
Second try. Tried sneaking but he noticed. Lydia died.
Third try. Shocked him to death. No casualties.

Now I learned that the best strategy against necromancers is Pikachu.

topics.body:
Fun HJSDGCE fact:
Every time I watch a weird event or video (eg: Episodes of Adventure Time or anything Fluffle Puff), my voice will be extremely high, I will laugh maniacally and say things like "what did I watch?" or "what am I doing with my life?".

"@NotYourAverageLurker":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54ce1f506368725857af0700#post_54ce1f506368725857af0700
